articles.title: See George Conway's reaction to Trump's reported plan if he wins again - CNN Video
articles.description: George Conway reacts to Axios reporting that Trump and his allies are secretly making plans to fire thousands of career civil servants and install Trump loyalists if he wins the presidential election in 2024.

articles.author: Scott McLean, Sarah Dean, Dennis Lapin and Cristiana Moisescu, CNN
articles.title: Ukrainian military couples rush to the altar amid uncertainty of war
articles.description: By late morning, a line has already formed outside the nondescript registration office on the western edge of Kyiv. Some of those waiting are wearing casual clothes, but a few of the women are dressed up in white and carrying bouquets of flowers.

articles.title: Video: US drone technology is ending up in Russia's hands - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Nic Robertson shows how Western technology used in drones is helping Russia to track and kill Ukrainian forces.

articles.author: Analysis by Brad Lendon, CNN
articles.title: Russian Navy's massive submarine could set the stage for 'a new Cold war'
articles.description: The Russian Navy has taken delivery of what is the world's longest known submarine, one its maker touts as a research vessel -- but what others say is a platform for espionage and possibly nuclear weapons.

articles.author: Rob Picheta, Radina Gigova, Gul Tuysuz, Alex Stambaugh and Jake Kwon, CNN
articles.title: Russian missiles strike Odesa one day after grain export deal agreed
articles.description: Russian missile strikes have hit the southern Ukrainian port of Odesa, just one day after Ukraine and Russia agreed on a deal that would allow the resumption of vital grain exports from the region.

articles.author: Brian Stelter, CNN Business
articles.title: Murdoch's New York Post publishes scathing critique of Donald Trump
articles.description: Two of Donald Trump's favorite newspapers — controlled by his media ally Rupert Murdoch — deem Trump "unworthy" and a failure after hearings

articles.author: Jason Hanna, Rebekah Riess, Sara Smart, Andy Rose
articles.title: California's fast-moving Oak Fire burns nearly 12,000 acres and forces evacuations outside Yosemite National Park
articles.description: A wildfire raging for a second day Saturday in central California's Mariposa County outside Yosemite National Park has burned nearly 12,000 acres and forced evacuations of rural communities, fire officials said.

articles.author: Jennifer Hansler
articles.title: Two Americans killed in Ukraine's Donbas region
articles.description: Two American citizens recently died in the Donbas region of Ukraine, the State Department confirmed Saturday.
articles.content:
Two American citizens recently died in the Donbas region of Ukraine, the State Department confirmed Saturday.

articles.author: Whitney Wild, Jeremy Herb
articles.title: First on CNN: Secret Service identified potential missing text messages on phones of 10 individuals
articles.description: Secret Service investigators were scrutinizing the phones of 10 Secret Service personnel that contained metadata showing text messages were sent and received around January 6, 2021, but were not retained, two sources told CNN.

articles.author: Natasha Bertrand and Jim Sciutto, CNN
articles.title: Russia's Ukraine war effort running 'out of steam' as Putin's ability to spy in Europe cut in half, MI6 chief says
articles.description: The chief of Britain's foreign intelligence service believes that Russia is losing steam in its invasion of Ukraine, and has lost its ability to spy in Europe "by half" following the expulsion of more than 400 Russian intelligence officers from cities across …
